short_description: Fit cox survival curves (survival functions) from given new predictions.
long_description: Fit cox survival curves (survival functions) from given new predictions.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.rDescription: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the database where the input table is located.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database password of the user.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.rDescription: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.rDescription: The password for the SSL truststore.
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: CoxLinearPredictorModelTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the Cox linear predictor model table, which was output by the ta.coxph function.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the Cox linear predictor model table, which was output by the CoxPH function.

argument_clauses.name: CoxCoefModelTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the Cox coefficient model table, which was output by the ta.coxph function.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the Cox coefficient model table, which was output by the CoxPH function.

argument_clauses.name: PredictTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the predict table, which contains new prediction feature values for survival calculation.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the predict table, which contains new prediction feature values for survival calculation.

argument_clauses.name: OutputTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the output table that contains survival probabilities. The table must not exist
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the output table that contains survival probabilities. The table must not exist

argument_clauses.name: PredictFeatureColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the columns that contain the values for the features in the Cox model—one column name for each feature name. The ith feature name corresponds to the ith column name. For example, consider this pair of arguments: predict.feature.names('name', 'age') predict.feature.columns('c1', 'c2') The predictive values of the feature 'name' are in column 'c1', and the predictive values of the feature 'age' are in column 'c2'
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the columns that contain the values for the features in the Cox model—one column name for each feature name. The ith feature name corresponds to the ith column name. For example, consider this pair of arguments: Predict_Feature_Names('name', 'age') Predict_Feature_Columns('c1', 'c2') The predictive values of the feature 'name' are in column 'c1', and the predictive values of the feature 'age' are in column 'c2'

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the columns in predict_table that the function copies to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the columns in predict_table that the function copies to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: PredictFeatureNames
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of features in the Cox model.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of features in the Cox model.
